createBackgroundService() - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.BleTracker
Creates a background service which operates in the background and gets called from time to time by the system This causes low battery drain but also the refresh rate is low Also this will NOT!
createBackgroundService(ArrayList<BeaconNotifier>, RemoteConnection) - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.BleTrackerService
Creates a service which operates in background Do not change the order of the calls in this constructor without knowing what you are doing!
createBasicSimulatedBeacons() - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.TimedBeaconSimulator
Creates simulated beacons all at once.
createForegroundService(Notification) - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.BleTracker
Creates a service which also operates in background but will never go asleep thus your app stays in foreground This causes huge battery drain but also gives a very good refresh rate
createForegroundService(ArrayList<BeaconNotifier>, Notification, RemoteConnection) - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.BleTrackerService
Creates a service which also operates in background but will never go asleep Do not change the order of the calls in this constructor without knowing what you are doing!
createTimedSimulatedBeacons() - Method in class saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.TimedBeaconSimulator
Simulates a new beacon every 10 seconds until it runs out of new ones to add.
